links.title: Checking the proxy and the firewall
links.content:
# Investor Relations

## Company Overview

## Helping the World Keep Promises

Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is one of the largest North American less-than-truckload (“LTL”) motor carriers and provides regional, inter-regional and national LTL services through a single integrated, union-free organization. Our service offerings, which include expedited transportation, are provided through an expansive network of service centers located throughout the continental United States. The Company also maintains strategic alliances with other carriers to provide LTL services throughout North America. In addition to its core LTL services, the Company offers a range of value-added services including container drayage, truckload brokerage and supply chain consulting.

## Latest News

Nov 18, 2024

###  [ Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. Announces General Rate Increase ](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/318/old-dominion-freight-line-inc-announces-general-rate)

[View Press Release](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/318/old-dominion-freight-line-inc-announces-general-rate) [View All](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases)

![](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/504/3610/image.jpg)

Nov 8, 2024

### [Old Dominion Freight Line Announces Partnership with Folds of Honor](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/317/old-dominion-freight-line-announces-partnership-with-folds)

Oct 23, 2024

### [Old Dominion Freight Line Reports Third Quarter 2024 Earnings Per Diluted Share of $1.43](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/316/old-dominion-freight-line-reports-third-quarter-2024)

Oct 17, 2024

### [Old Dominion Freight Line Announces $0.26 Per Share Quarterly Cash Dividend](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/315/old-dominion-freight-line-announces-0-26-per-share)

## Latest Presentation

[ ![Latest Presentation](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/files/theme/images/ir-laptop.png) ](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/426/4175/pdf/3Q2024_November.pdf "Opens in a new window")

November 12, 2024 

[ Investor Presentation ](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/426/4175/pdf/3Q2024_November.pdf "Opens in a new window")

[View Presentation](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/426/4175/pdf/3Q2024_November.pdf "Opens in a new window")

![Old Dominion Freight Truck](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/504/3983/image.png)

## How We Serve Our Growing Customers

23K

Full-time employees

57K

Tractors and trailers

261

Service centers across 48 states

*Data is as of December 31, 2023, with the exception of service centers, which is shown with the latest data available.

## Latest Financial Results

### Q3 2024

Quarter Ended Sep 30, 2024

## Helping the World Keep Promises

Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is one of the largest North American less-than-truckload (“LTL”) motor carriers and provides regional, inter-regional and national LTL services through a single integrated, union-free organization. Our service offerings, which include expedited transportation, are provided through an expansive network of service centers located throughout the continental United States. The Company also maintains strategic alliances with other carriers to provide LTL services throughout North America. In addition to its core LTL services, the Company offers a range of value-added services including container drayage, truckload brokerage and supply chain consulting.

## Led By Integrity

People keep promises, and that's what everyone who works at Old Dominion does. The values that drove our founders decades ago still inspire us today.

Manage Cookie Preferences Reject All Accept All Cookies

![Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/f524c355-e5ef-4083-b5ca-c4f75b227b5b/30d5e501-6971-49ce-8191-dc518b783bf3/6279f21e-024d-4b7a-b685-4cf7980cad15/ODLogo_50x140.png)

## Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [More information](https://www.odfl.com/us/en/cookie-policy.html "Opens in a new window")[Privacy Policy](https://www.odfl.com/us/en/privacy-policy.html "Opens in a new window")

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Marketing Cookies

Marketing Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Back Button

### Cookie List

Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is one of the largest North American less-than-truckload (“LTL”) motor carriers and provides regional, inter-regional and national LTL services through a single integrated, union-free organization. Our service offerings, which include expedited transportation, are provided through an expansive network of service centers located throughout the continental United States. The Company also maintains strategic alliances with other carriers to provide LTL services throughout North America. In addition to its core LTL services, the Company offers a range of value-added services including container drayage, truckload brokerage and supply chain consulting.

![Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/f524c355-e5ef-4083-b5ca-c4f75b227b5b/30d5e501-6971-49ce-8191-dc518b783bf3/6279f21e-024d-4b7a-b685-4cf7980cad15/ODLogo_50x140.png)

## Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [More information](https://www.odfl.com/us/en/cookie-policy.html)[Privacy Policy](https://www.odfl.com/us/en/privacy-policy.html)

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Marketing Cookies

Marketing Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Back Button

links.title: If you use a proxy server…
links.content:
**Your web browser (Chrome 91) has a serious security vulnerability!** Update your browser for more security, speed and the best experience on this site. [Update browser](https://browser-update.org/update-browser.html#3.3.55:ir.odfl.com) Ignore

# Investor Relations

## Company Overview

## Helping the World Keep Promises

Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is one of the largest North American less-than-truckload (“LTL”) motor carriers and provides regional, inter-regional and national LTL services through a single integrated, union-free organization. Our service offerings, which include expedited transportation, are provided through an expansive network of service centers located throughout the continental United States. The Company also maintains strategic alliances with other carriers to provide LTL services throughout North America. In addition to its core LTL services, the Company offers a range of value-added services including container drayage, truckload brokerage and supply chain consulting.

## Latest News

Nov 18, 2024

###  [ Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. Announces General Rate Increase ](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/318/old-dominion-freight-line-inc-announces-general-rate)

[View Press Release](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/318/old-dominion-freight-line-inc-announces-general-rate) [View All](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases)

![](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/504/3610/image.jpg)

Nov 8, 2024

### [Old Dominion Freight Line Announces Partnership with Folds of Honor](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/317/old-dominion-freight-line-announces-partnership-with-folds)

Oct 23, 2024

### [Old Dominion Freight Line Reports Third Quarter 2024 Earnings Per Diluted Share of $1.43](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/316/old-dominion-freight-line-reports-third-quarter-2024)

Oct 17, 2024

### [Old Dominion Freight Line Announces $0.26 Per Share Quarterly Cash Dividend](https://ir.odfl.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/315/old-dominion-freight-line-announces-0-26-per-share)

## Latest Presentation

[ ![Latest Presentation](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/files/theme/images/ir-laptop.png) ](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/426/4175/pdf/3Q2024_November.pdf "Opens in a new window")

November 12, 2024 

[ Investor Presentation ](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/426/4175/pdf/3Q2024_November.pdf "Opens in a new window")

[View Presentation](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/426/4175/pdf/3Q2024_November.pdf "Opens in a new window")

![Old Dominion Freight Truck](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/db/504/3983/image.png)

## How We Serve Our Growing Customers

23K

Full-time employees

57K

Tractors and trailers

261

Service centers across 48 states

*Data is as of December 31, 2023, with the exception of service centers, which is shown with the latest data available.

## Latest Financial Results

### Q3 2024

Quarter Ended Sep 30, 2024

## 72.7%

Operating ratio for Q3 2024

For complete information regarding our financials, see our [periodic filings](/sec-filings/all-sec-filings)

## Sign Up for Email Alerts

Receive updates straight into your inbox

[Sign Up Today](/news-events/email-alerts)

![](https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_bacb46f5ca7a30bf95559dc34f88bbf0/odfl/files/theme/images/ir-report.png)

## Helping the World Keep Promises

Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is one of the largest North American less-than-truckload (“LTL”) motor carriers and provides regional, inter-regional and national LTL services through a single integrated, union-free organization. Our service offerings, which include expedited transportation, are provided through an expansive network of service centers located throughout the continental United States. The Company also maintains strategic alliances with other carriers to provide LTL services throughout North America. In addition to its core LTL services, the Company offers a range of value-added services including container drayage, truckload brokerage and supply chain consulting.

## Led By Integrity

People keep promises, and that's what everyone who works at Old Dominion does. The values that drove our founders decades ago still inspire us today.

[View Management Team](/company-information/management-team) [View Board of Directors](/corporate-governance/board-of-directors)
